ygData.subject: perma bug/exploit (feel free to bug/feedback it on your server)
ygData.msgSnippet: I reported this to Verant and even caught a L50 cleric exploiting it (petitioned, got a GM in 5 mins that was going to investigate, 2 hours later said cleric
ygData.messageBody:
I reported this to Verant and even caught a L50 cleric exploiting it
(petitioned, got a GM in 5 mins that was going to investigate, 2 hours later
said cleric still tooling away unhampered... so, it must be okay to do and
it will certainly help you out).

If you're in the king room and fear a mob, it goes haulin' butt (like I
really need to see more goblin crack) towards the gated trestles, opens the
smaller first, stops, turns, opens the larger second, runs to the facing
wall then despawns.

Every single time.

This would be useful if, say, you're camping twink goods but don't feel like
killing green stuff that didn't spawn visible goodies or those annoying
placeholders. This would also rock for us bards with AE fear... never worry
about getting swarmed while you're doing the king room ever again!

(Yes, I'm very bitter. The aforemented L50 cleric is a member of the most
powerful guild on my server - you would expect more, but then again... that
would be one possible explanation for how you become the most powerful
guild, eh? *argh*)

-GW
<Tork@Nameless>

PS: Going with the quantity over quality motif for getting out of hell
levels, what's the scoop for 40th? 30 and 35 can both easily (less than 2
days for each) be slogged through in cazic - 30th for gators, 35th gators
still work, but I found AoF to be a little more fun - looted my own claws!
=). The key is to not have pride... What? You're in cazic again?!!? Leave
the luggage alone! -Yeah yeah yeah, shuddup and come join me. P
